entry.title: WIND WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 11:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: NNE 56 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
